## Spatial Data Science: General

-   Pebesma, Edzer, and Roger Bivand. 2023. [*Spatial Data Science: With Applications in R*](https://r-spatial.org/book/). 1st edition. Boca Raton, FL: Chapman; Hall/CRC.

-   Lovelace, Robin, Jakub Nowosad, and Jannes Muenchow. 2020. [*Geocomputation with R*](https://r.geocompx.org/index.html). 1st edition. Boca Raton London New York: Chapman; Hall/CRC.

-   Moraga, Paula. 2023. [*Spatial Statistics for Data Science: Theory and Practice with R*](https://www.paulamoraga.com/book-spatial/). 1st edition. Boca Raton, FL: Chapman; Hall/CRC.

-   Wimberly, Michael C. 2023. [*Geographic Data Science with R: Visualizing and Analyzing Environmental Change*](https://bookdown.org/mcwimberly/gdswr-book/). 1st edition. Boca Raton London New York: Chapman; Hall/CRC.

-   Rey, Sergio, Dani Arribas-Bel, and Levi John Wolf. 2023. [*Geographic Data Science with Python*](https://geographicdata.science/book/intro.html). 1st edition. Boca Raton London New York: Chapman; Hall/CRC.

-   Acosta, Luc Anselin, Grant Morrison, Angela Li, Karina. 2023. *Hands-on Spatial Data Science with R*. [https://spatialanalysis.github.io/handsonspatialdata/index.html](https://spatialanalysis.github.io/handsonspatialdata/).

## Spatial Data Analysis and Spatial Statistics

-   Paez, Antonio. 2024. *An Introduction to Spatial Data Analysis and Statistics: A Course in r*. <https://paezha.github.io/spatial-analysis-r/>.

## Mapping and GeoVisualization

-   Tennekes, Martijn, and Jakub Nowosad. 2021. *Elegant and Informative Maps with Tmap*. <https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap-book/>.

-   Protić, Milan Kilibarda i Dragutin. 2019. *Introduction to Geovisualization and Web Cartography*. <https://osgl.grf.bg.ac.rs/books/gvvk-en/>.

-   Fidan, Emine. *Guide to Creating Interactive Maps in R*. <https://bookdown.org/eneminef/DRR_Bookdown/>.

## GIS

-   Slingsby, Jasper. 2023. *A Minimal Introduction to GIS (in R)*. <https://www.ecologi.st/spatial-r/>.
